sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī míng zázhì biānjí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle est rédactrice de magazine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is a magazine editor.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他在公司有很高的地位。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài gōngsī yǒu hěn gāo de dìwèi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il occupe une position élevée dans l'entreprise.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has a high position in the company.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì wǒmen zhījiān de mìmì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un secret entre nous.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a secret between us.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Mìshū ānpái le huìyì shíjiān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La secrétaire a organisé l'heure de la réunion.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The secretary arranged the meeting time.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Liǎng guó guānxì fēicháng mìqiè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les relations entre les deux pays sont très étroites.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The relationship between the two countries is very close.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ yī zhāng míngpiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez me donner une carte de visite.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please give me a business card.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gōngsī gěi le tā jīngjì bǔcháng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'entreprise lui a accordé une compensation financière.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The company gave him financial compensation.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de nǎodai hěn cōngmíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a une tête intelligente.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has a clever head.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de yāoqiú tài guòfèn le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ses exigences sont excessives.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His demands are excessive.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì nèikē yīshēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est médecin interniste.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is an internal medicine doctor.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhǒng bìng huì chuánrǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette maladie est contagieuse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This disease is contagious.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè bēi kāfēi tài nóng le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce café est trop fort.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This coffee is too strong.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī gè nénggàn de yuángōng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une employée compétente.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is a capable employee.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 趁天气好，我们去散步吧。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chèn tiānqì hǎo, wǒmen qù sànbù ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Profitons du beau temps pour aller nous promener.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's take a walk while the weather is nice.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì wǒmen de xīn chǎnpǐn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est notre nouveau produit.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is our new product.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè xiàng jìshù yǒu hěn duō yìngyòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette technologie a de nombreuses applications.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This technology has many applications.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ de kànfǎ tài piànmiàn le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ton point de vue est trop partial.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Your view is too one-sided.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wèntí chǎnshēng le hěn duō máodùn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le problème a engendré de nombreux conflits.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The problem has caused many conflicts.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Píngjūn měi rén huāfèi yībǎi yuán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Chaque personne dépense en moyenne cent yuans.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Each person spends an average of one hundred yuan.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Húmiàn hěn píngjìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La surface du lac est très calme.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The lake surface is very calm.
